holidays.title: Constantin Brancusi Day
holidays.description: Join us on Constantin Brancusi Day and celebrate one of the 20th century’s most acclaimed sculptors.

holidays.title: Daisy Gatson Bates Day
holidays.description: Celebrate this praise-worthy activist who believed in fighting against racial inequality and injustice.

holidays.title: Family Day
holidays.description: Family Day is celebrated in Canada on the third Monday in February.

holidays.title: Islander Day
holidays.description: Start planning for the short winter break as we glide into Islander Day.

holidays.title: Iwo Jima Day
holidays.description: The 1945 battle cost the lives of American soldiers who were wounded and killed.

holidays.title: Louis Riel Day
holidays.description: Get ready to dive into Manitoban history as we remember and celebrate Louis Riel.

holidays.title: National Airboat Day
holidays.description: Don't miss your date with the gators, and bring your family along to Wild Florida.

holidays.title: National Arabian Horse Day
holidays.description: Mount or caress one, get ready to do fun things that involve the Arabian horse today.

holidays.title: National Chocolate Mint Day
holidays.description: This triumphant flavor combination means an entire day dedicated to its taste and vigor.

holidays.title: National Lash Day
holidays.description: Eyelashes are important to our appearance. They serve both functional and aesthetic purposes.

holidays.title: National Vet Girls ROCK Day
holidays.description: We celebrate the extraordinarily courageous women who risk their lives fighting for peace in the world.

holidays.title: Nova Scotia Heritage Day
holidays.description: Nova Scotia Heritage Day celebrates the unique people, heritage, and history of Nova Scotia.

holidays.title: Presidents' Day
holidays.description: We celebrate America's greatest in all our patriotic glory.

holidays.title: Prevent Plagiarism Day
holidays.description: Join us as we get ready to raise awareness about plagiarism on this day.

holidays.title: Shivaji Jayanti
holidays.description: This day is dedicated to the young and brave warrior, Maharaj the Emperor.

holidays.title: The Day of Illustrious Puerto Ricans
holidays.description: Get ready to understand the importance of the Day of Illustrious Puerto Ricans and its history.

holidays.title: U.S. Coast Guard Reserve Birthday
holidays.description: February 19 is annually commemorated as the founding day of the U.S. Coast Guard Reserve.

holidays.title: Cynthia Bailey’s Birthday
holidays.description: She is a supermodel, actress, T.V. star, businesswoman, and a lot more!

holidays.title: Millie Bobby Brown’s Birthday
holidays.description: At only a young age, this actor has taken Hollywood by storm.

holidays.title: Royalty Johnson’s Birthday
holidays.description: Royalty Johnson has perfected the skill of providing content that her audience enjoys.

holidays.title: Smokey Robinson’s Birthday
holidays.description: This multi-talented musician has created a timeless and relevant legacy for future generations.
